name: streamlit-lab
postCreateCommand: bash -c "curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && export PATH=$PATH:/home/vscode/.cargo/bin && uv venv && uv pip install -r .devcontainer/requirements.txt"
postStartCommand: bash -c "source .venv/bin/activate && streamlit run app.py --server.port 8501 --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false &"
